content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-83 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- Wooden chests for coal collection at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) for coal transfer

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining Station at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (-28.0,-61.0)
- Wooden chest at position (-27.5,-59.5)
- Burner inserter at position (-26.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at position (-27.0,-58.0)
- Output chest at position (-24.5,-58.5)

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-59)
Consists of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Collection chests at positions (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting the mining area
- Multiple burner inserters for ore transfer

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at positions (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at positions (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for material transfer

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at position (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at position (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting water supply to steam engine
- Electric poles forming electricity network at positions (11.5,20.5), (10.5,12.5), (7.5,20.5), (7.5,13.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to extraction operations
- Cannot extract items from empty or non-existent containers
- Ensure the source container has the requested items before attempting extraction

### Entity placement and fuel issues
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel - ensure continuous fuel supply to maintain operation
- Burner inserters are waiting for source items - verify proper connection and item flow in the production chain

### System connectivity issues
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" warning - ensure proper pipe connections and fluid flow from boiler to steam engine
- Some transport belt groups are empty - verify proper item input and belt connectivity

### Space management
- Some inserters are blocked due to full output containers - regularly empty full chests to maintain production flow
- Ensure proper spacing between entities during placement to avoid blocking issues
